Verses: 1 un Dhevanaakiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharikkak Kodukkum Dhesaththil, Kolaiseyyappattuk Kidakkira Oruvanai Veliyile Kandu, Avanaik Kondravan Innaan Endru Theriyaadhirundhaal,
2 un Moopparum Un Niyaayaadhibadhigalum Purappattuppoi, Kolaiseyyappattavanaich Sutrilum Irukkum Pattanangalmattum Alappaargalaaga.
3 kolaiseyyappattavanukkuch Sameebamaana Pattanaththu Mooppar, Velaiyil Panpadaadhadhum Nugaththatiyil Pinaikkappadaadhadhumaana Oru Kitaariyaip Pidiththu,
4 uzhudhu Vidhaiyaadha Dharisaana Pallaththaakkile Adhaik Kondupoi, Andhap Pallaththaakkile Adhin Thalaiyai Vettippodakkadavargal.

5 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamakku Aaraadhanai Seyyavum Karththarudaiya Naamaththile Aaseervadhikkavum Leviyin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyaraith Therindhukondaatiyaal, Avargalum Aththarunaththil Vandhirukkavendum; Avargal Vaakkinbadiye Sagala Vazhakkum Sagala Kaayachchedhamum Theerkkappadavendum.
6 kolaiseyyappattavanukkuch Sameebamaana Pattanaththin Mooppar Ellaarum Pallaththaakkile Thalai Vettappatta Kitaariyinmel Thangal Kaigalaik Kazhuvi:
7 engal Kaigal Andha Raththaththaich Sindhinadhum Illai, Engal Kangal Adhaik Kandadhum Illai;

8 karththaave, Neer Meettukkonda Umadhu Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Kutramillaadha Raththappazhiyaich Sumaththaamal Umadhu Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Kirubaiyullavaraayirum Endru Solvaargalaaga; Appozhudhu Raththappazhi Avargalukku Nivirththiyaakum.
9 ippadik Karththarin Paarvaikkuch Semmaiyaanadhai Nee Seyvaayaagil, Kutramillaadha Raththappazhiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkippoduvaai.
10 nee Un Saththurukkalukku Edhiraaga Yuththaththirkup Purappattu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Un Kaiyil Oppukkodukkiradhinaal, Avargalaich Chiraipidiththuvandhu,
11 siraigalil Roobavadhiyaana Oru Sthireeyaikkandu, Avalai Vivaagampanna Virumbi,
12 avalai Un Veettirkul Azhaiththukkondupovaayaanaal, Aval Than Thalaiyaich Chiraiththu, Than Nagangalaik Kalaindhu,

13 than Siraiyiruppin Vasthiraththaiyum Neekki, Un Veettilirundhu, Oru Maadhamattum Than Thagappanaiyum Thaayaiyum Ninaiththuth Thukkangondaadakkadaval; Adhanpinbu Nee Avalode Serndhu, Avalukku Purushanaayiru, Aval Unakku Manaiviyaayiruppaal.

14 avalmel Unakkup Piriyamillaamarponaal, Nee Avalai Panaththirku Virkaamal, Avalaith Than Ishtappadi Pogavidalaam; Nee Avalaith Thaazhmaippaduththinabadiyinaal Avalaale Aadhaayam Perumbadi Thedavendaam.

15 irandu Manaivigalaiyudaiya Oruvan, Oruththiyinmel Viruppaayum Matravalmel Veruppaayum Irukka, Iruvarum Avanukkup Pillaigalaip Petraargaleyaagil Mudharpirandhavan Verukkappattavalin Puththiranaanaalum,

16 thagappan Thanakku Undaana Aasthiyaith Than Pillaigalukkup Pangidumnaalil, Verukkappattavalidaththil Pirandha Mudharperaanavanukku Seshtapuththira Sudhandharaththai Kodukkavendumeyallaamal, Virumbappattavalidaththil Pirandhavanukkuk Kodukkalaagaadhu.

17 verukkappattavalidaththil Pirandhavanai Seshtapuththiranaaga Angigariththu, Thanakku Undaana Aasthigalilellaam Irandu Pangai Avanukkuk Kodukkavendum; Avan Than Thagappanudaiya Mudharpalan, Seshtapuththira Sudhandharam Avanukke Uriyadhu.
18 than Thagappan Sollaiyum Than Thaayin Sollaiyum Kelaamalum, Avargalaal Thandikkappattum, Avargalukkuk Keezhppadiyaamalum Pogira Adangaadha Thushdappillai Oruvanukku Irundhaal,
19 avan Thagappanum Avan Thaayum Avanaip Pidiththu, Avan Irukkum Pattanaththin Moopparidaththukkum Avvidaththu Vaasalukkum Avanaik Kondupoi:
20 engal Maganaagiya Ivan Adangaadha Thushtanaayirukkiraan; Engal Sollaik Kelaan; Peruntheenikkaaranum Kudiyanumaayirukkiraan Endru Pattanaththin Moopparode Solluvaargalaaga.

21 appozhudhu Avan Saagumbadi Andhap Pattanaththu Manidharellaam Avanmel Kalleriyakkadavargal; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkippodavendum; Isravelar Ellaarum Adhaik Kettup Bayappaduvaargal.
22 kolaiseyyappada Oruvanmel Saavukkup Paaththiramaana Paavam Undaayirukka, Avanaik Kolaiseyyumbadi Maraththile Thookkippoduvaayaanaal,

23 iravile Avan Piredham Maraththile Thongalaagaadhu; Annaaliledhaane Adhai Adakkampannavendum; Thookkippodappattavan Dhevanaal Sabikkappattavan; Aagaiyaal Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkum Un Dhesaththaith Theettuppaduththaayaaga.
